thread.section_title: Colonial Properties Cabin & Resort Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Colonial Properties Cabin & Resort Rentals | smokymtndreams.com
thread.title: Jeanine
thread.title_full: Colonial Properties Cabin & Resort Rentals reviewed by Jeanine

author: Jeanine
title: Jeanine
text:
The entire staff was wonderful. They were all very helpful, and accommodated us at the last minute.
There was no Wi-Fi, and the issue did not get resolved. There were small issues with the cabin, including Heating, small animals in the walls, and no insulation between the floors.
The cabin was very clean, ready to go, and well equipped. We left coffee filters and dish soap, which would be helpful for the next group. A few extra towels would have been helpful. The beds are comfortable and there is plenty of seating, inside and out.
The cabin is located in a great spot, and we used the coupons provided, which was a fun addition to our trip.
